Articles.Content:
Salutations, fellow kerbals!

I have a challenge!

Get to minmus using only 1 tank of fuel! Any type of fuel, and the fuel can be a big as you want.

PM me if you have completed this challenge. I will need screenshots as proof. Or a video.

People completed this challenge

1st

2nd

3rd

4th

5th

6th

7th

8th

9th

10th

Can we use solids as strap ons?

Can we just ORBIT MM, or do we have to land?

And I assume you don\'t want anyone using the orange sphere tank?

:

Can we use solids as strap ons?

Can we just ORBIT MM, or do we have to land?

And I assume you don\'t want anyone using the orange sphere tank?

:

You can use ANY fuel tank you want . 4 max. boosters, have to be solid, and I don\'t really know which orange sphere tank but if it has unlimited fuel, forget it.

You can orbit, or you can land, You\'re choice.

Okeee dokes. The orange tank doesn\'t have unlimited fuel, but it has a lot.

I\'ll give it a go if I get time!

Okeee dokes. The orange tank doesn\'t have unlimited fuel, but it has a lot.

I\'ll give it a go if I get time!

Okay, you can use that then.

Good luck.

You\'ll need it.

I think you\'re overly generous saying any non-infinite tank.

Single 3-meter tank, 5 engines, and enough fuel to make it to Minmus and back 3-4 times over.
